Function is_punctuation(c) returns .true. if c is '.', ',', '!', '?'. So in Fortran:

logical function is_latin_letter(c)
   character, intent(in) :: c
   integer :: ichar_c
   ichar_c = ichar(c)
   is_latin_letter = (ichar_c >= 97 .and. ichar_c <= 122)
end function

logical function is_punctuation(c)
   character, intent(in) :: c
   is_punctuation = (c == '.' .or. c == ',' .or. c == '?' .or. c == '!')
end function

FUNCTION is_latin_letter(c) RESULT(res)
   CHARACTER, INTENT(IN) :: c
   LOGICAL :: res
   INTEGER :: ichar_c
   ichar_c = ICHAR(c)
   res = (ichar_c >= 97 .AND. ichar_c <= 122) END FUNCTION is_latin_letter

FUNCTION is_punctuation(c) RESULT(res)
   CHARACTER, INTENT(IN) :: c
   LOGICAL :: res
   res = (c == '.' .OR. c == ',' .OR. c == '?' .OR. c == '!') END FUNCTION is_punctuation Now, the main program:

PROGRAM main
   IMPLICIT NONE
   CHARACTER(LEN=1000) :: input_str, processed_str
   INTEGER :: len_in, len_out, i, num_tokens, count, current_token_length
   CHARACTER(LEN=100) :: current_token
   CHARACTER(LEN=100, DIMENSION=100) :: tokens

   ! Read input
   READ(*, '(A)') input_str
   len_in = LEN_TRIM(input_str)

   ! Process the input string
   IF (len_in == 0) THEN
      processed_str = ''
      len_out = 0
   ELSE
      processed_str(1:1) = input_str(1:1) len_out = 1 DO i = 2, len_in
         CHARACTER :: current_char, prev_char
         current_char = input_str(i:i) prev_char = input_str(i-1:i-1)
children.label: code_analysis

IF (is_latin_letter(current_char)) THEN
            IF (.NOT. is_latin_letter(prev_char)) THEN
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = ' '
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
            ELSE
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
            END IF
         ELSE IF (is_punctuation(current_char)) THEN
            len_out = len_out + 1
            processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
         END IF
      END DO
   END IF

   ! Split into tokens
   current_token = ''
   num_tokens = 0 DO i = 1, len_out
      CHARACTER :: c
      c = processed_str(i:i) IF (c == ' ') THEN
         IF (LEN_TRIM(current_token) > 0) THEN
            num_tokens = num_tokens + 1
            tokens(num_tokens) = current_token
            current_token = ''
         END IF
      ELSE
         current_token = TRIM(current_token) // c
      END IF
   END DO
   IF (LEN_TRIM(current_token) > 0) THEN
      num_tokens = num_tokens + 1
      tokens(num_tokens) = current_token
   END IF

   ! Count until "0"
   count = 0 DO i = 1, num_tokens
      count = count + 1
      IF (TRIM(tokens(i)) == '0') EXIT
   END DO

   !

FUNCTION is_latin_letter(c) RESULT(res)
   CHARACTER, INTENT(IN) :: c
   LOGICAL :: res
   INTEGER :: ichar_c
   ichar_c = ICHAR(c)
   res = (ichar_c >= 97 .AND. ichar_c <= 122)
END FUNCTION is_latin_letter

FUNCTION is_punctuation(c) RESULT(res)
   CHARACTER, INTENT(IN) :: c
   LOGICAL :: res
   res = (c == '.' .OR. c == ',' .OR. c == '?' .OR. c == '!')
END FUNCTION is_punctuation

Now, the main program:

PROGRAM main
   IMPLICIT NONE
   CHARACTER(LEN=1000) :: input_str, processed_str
   INTEGER :: len_in, len_out, i, num_tokens, count, current_token_length
   CHARACTER(LEN=100) :: current_token
   CHARACTER(LEN=100, DIMENSION=100) :: tokens

   ! Read input
   READ(*, '(A)') input_str
   len_in = LEN_TRIM(input_str)

   ! Process the input string
   IF (len_in == 0) THEN
      processed_str = ''
      len_out = 0
   ELSE
      processed_str(1:1) = input_str(1:1)
      len_out = 1
      DO i = 2, len_in
         CHARACTER :: current_char, prev_char
         current_char = input_str(i:i)
         prev_char = input_str(i-1:i-1)
         IF (is_latin_letter(current_char)) THEN
            IF (.NOT. is_latin_letter(prev_char)) THEN
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = ' '
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
            ELSE
               len_out = len_out + 1
               processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
            END IF
         ELSE IF (is_punctuation(current_char)) THEN
            len_out = len_out + 1
            processed_str(len_out:len_out) = current_char
         END IF
      END DO
   END IF

   ! Split into tokens
   current_token = ''
   num_tokens = 0
   DO i = 1, len_out
      CHARACTER :: c
      c = processed_str(i:i)
      IF (c == ' ') THEN
         IF (LEN_TRIM(current_token) > 0) THEN
            num_tokens = num_tokens + 1
            tokens(num_tokens) = current_token
            current_token = ''
         END IF
      ELSE
         current_token = TRIM(current_token) // c
      END IF
   END DO
   IF (LEN_TRIM(current_token) > 0) THEN
      num_tokens = num_tokens + 1
      tokens(num_tokens) = current_token
   END IF

   ! Count until "0"
   count = 0
   DO i = 1, num_tokens
      count = count + 1
      IF (TRIM(tokens(i)) == '0') EXIT
   END DO

   ! Output the result
   WRITE(*, '(I0)') count

END PROGRAM main
